Hero.title: Your Mental Health, Your Privacy, Your Peace
Hero.subtitle: With I.Z.I you can have meaningful conversations, connect with others, and discover daily wisdom that guides your growth.

cards.subtitle: Anonymous Chats with Anyone
cards.text: Find people who are also looking to share. Have true, meaningful and anonymous conversations without any judgement.

cards.subtitle: Private Diary for Yourself
cards.text: Write, talk and share your daily thoughts in a digital diary that gets to know you better every day.

cards.subtitle: Daily Fortune Cookies
cards.text: Get daily messages that give you advice, support or motivation. Every message is unique and tailored to your situation.

Chat.title: Anonymous Chat
Chat.subtitle: Because being alone does not mean having no one to talk to
Chat.text1: Share experiences and connect with people who also want to talk to you. Express freely, safely and in an anonymous space.
Chat.li1-text: Save conversations to go back to them anytime
Chat.li3-text: P2P secured encryption for your chats
Chat.note-chats: Note: Inactive chats are erased after 7 days of inactivity
Chat.alt: Image of the anonymous chat from the I.Z.I app
Chat.free-li2: Both people must agree to save a chat
Chat.premium-li1: There’s no limits! Save as many conversations as you want
Chat.premium-li2: Both people must agree to save a chat

Diary.title: Private Diary
Diary.phrase3: “Because putting it into words, helps to let go”
Diary.text: With I.Z.I you have a private and safe diary. Write freely and save memories for your future self

Diary-Tabs.tab1-text:
Write every day. Annotate your thoughts, feelings and secrets without worries.

Everything is safely saved and encrypted in the cloud. No one but you can read what you write on the diary.

Get suggestions and recommendations from ZANA. An AI helper that gets to know you better, and helps you keep going.
Diary-Tabs.tab2-text:
With I.Z.I Premium you get to choose from different visual styles and fonts to better reflect your personality to your diary.

Get everything from the free version plus:
Diary-Tabs.tab2-li1: More space to write your thoughts.
Diary-Tabs.tab1-alt: image of the IZI free diary

Cookies.title: Daily Fortune Cookies
Cookies.phrase2: “The right message at the perfect moment”
Cookies.card1-text: Receive daily messages tailored for you. Pieces of advise or motivation that you can choose to keep in your private diary for easy access and to act as reminders.
Cookies.card1-alt: free fortune cookie with motivational message
Cookies.card2-text:
Get more messages to improve yourself.

With I.Z.I Premium you unlock new extra cookies every day, including golden cookies with exclusive messages and new challenges to drive your growth
Cookies.card2-alt: premium fortune cookie with motivational message

Pricing.title: Choose your way to use I.Z.I
Pricing.subtitle: Start taking care of your mental health. Download the app or upgrade to premium and begin your Journey alongside I.Z.I
Pricing.free-li1-text: Access to ZANA, an AI that makes you company
Pricing.free-li4-text: Access your digital and encrypted Private Diary
Pricing.free-li5-text: Receive 1 daily advice from a fortune cookie
Pricing.premium-li3-text: Save an unlimited amount of private conversations to your account
Pricing.premium-li5-text: Receive up to X daily messages with advise from fortune cookies
Pricing.premium-upgrade: Upgrade to get the full experience at I.Z.I

Newsletter.title: Be up to date with I.Z.I
Newsletter.text: Receive advice, tips on how to use the app, and get the latest news about future versions of I.Z.I.

Footer.question: Do you like what you see?
Footer.copyright: Copyright @2025 I.Z.I Premium. All right reserved

Cancel.title: Payment Cancelled
Cancel.subtitle: No worries! Your payment was cancelled and you haven't been charged.
Cancel.reason2: Unlimited access to your personal AI
Cancel.reason3: Save as many chats as you want
Cancel.reason5: Get daily premium advise from the fortune cookies

NotFound.title: Page Not Found
NotFound.subtitle: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist. It might have been moved, deleted, or you entered the wrong URL.
